name.baseName: Bioethanol ; Collection and transportation ; Steam explosion

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The bioethanol production data set represents the process of collecting and transporting biomass, followed by pretreatment through steam explosion. This bioethanol is suitable for use as a biofuel in automotive applications, specifically for the combustion in vehicles designed to run on ethanol or ethanol-blended fuels.
该生物乙醇生产数据集代表了收集和运输生物质的过程，随后通过蒸汽爆破进行预处理。该生物乙醇适合用作汽车应用中的生物燃料，特别是用于设计运行在乙醇或乙醇混合燃料上的车辆的燃烧。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Through data quality evaluation, 141 datasets with high completeness and consistency were selected from the reported 561 datasets in 474 published papers and classified into eight technological configurations determined by the pretreatment technology. The technological steps following pretreatment were all the same, although actual flows and parameter values vary, as observed in the literature
technology.technologicalApplicability: The bioethanol production data set represents the process of collecting and transporting biomass, followed by pretreatment through steam explosion. This bioethanol is suitable for use as a biofuel in automotive applications, specifically for the combustion in vehicles designed to run on ethanol or ethanol-blended fuels.
该生物乙醇生产数据集代表了收集和运输生物质的过程，随后通过蒸汽爆破进行预处理。该生物乙醇适合用作汽车应用中的生物燃料，特别是用于设计运行在乙醇或乙醇混合燃料上的车辆的燃烧。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Global datasets were used where possible, since the study does not apply to any specific region. LCI data for one external process named “Combustion of bioethanol in car” were obtained from the GREET database
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: We assessed the robustness of the modeling results through uncertainty propagation (Monte Carlo), discernibility analysis, global sensitivity analysis, and scenario variation.
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data set for LCA, ensure that the scope of your study aligns with the global applicability of the data, as it is not region-specific. Incorporate the LCI data for 'Combustion of bioethanol in car' obtained from the GREET database for a comprehensive analysis. Carefully consider the technological configurations presented, and adjust the actual flows and parameter values based on observed variations in the literature. Apply uncertainty propagation such as Monte Carlo simulations, discernibility analysis, global sensitivity analysis, and scenario variation to assess the robustness of the modeling results appropriately.
使用此数据集进行生命周期评估(LCA)时，请确保您的研究范围与数据的全球适用性一致，因为它不是特定于任何区域的。为了进行全面分析，在LCA中纳入从GREET数据库获得的“汽车燃烧生物乙醇”的生命周期库存(LCI)数据。仔细考虑所呈现的技术配置，并根据文献中观察到的变化调整实际流量和参数值。适当地应用不确定性传播，如蒙特卡罗模拟、辨识性分析、全球敏感性分析和情景变化，以评估建模结果的稳健性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
